content.raw: Do we need all the `Ripple` elements? I removed them and the only difference I noticed is that the button doesn't look active after clicked, is that why they were added? I think that we don't need to keep the button "checked" after the user presses it, because once the user starts orbiting around the scene, that button check is no longer representative of the camera state. What do you think?
